messages.subject: dead squirrel
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/22/02 8:24:23 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/22/02 8:24:23 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Well, yesterday my son and his 2 friends found a dead squirrel >>

Here's a great website for reconstructing a squirrel skeleton, assuming you
get to it (the skeleton that is).
We found a mostly decomposed skeleton not too long ago, glued it to cardboard
and then did a reconstruction online which led to a lot of fun things we
looked up on google.

http://www.kidwings.com/skulls/redsquirrel/begin.htm

It'll help you out if you get stuck, we printed our finished version out on
paper. Fun!

Ren
